original_title: UFC on Fox 28: Emmett vs. Stephens
overview: UFC on Fox 28: Emmett vs. Stephens was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on February 24, 2018, at Amway Center in Orlando, Florida, United States. The event was headlined by a featherweight bout between Josh Emmett and Jeremy Stephens.
title: UFC on Fox 28: Emmett vs. Stephens
